title: Murder at the House in the Meadow: Episode 181
description:
Harry and Megan Tooze lived on a remote farm in the Vale of Glamorgan and enjoyed a quiet, private retirement. But one day in the summer of 1993, that life was shattered as both were killed in what was described as a "brutal, macabre execution".

In this episode of the UK True Crime podcast, I ask just who killed the couple? And why?
